title.en: Aspiration Prayer from the Vajravārāhī Feast Offering

text.en: Hoḥ!Infinite maṇḍala deities, turn your attention towards us!
text.en-trans: ho, rabjam kyilkhor lhatsok gong su sol

text.en: Through the power of this great samaya offering
text.en-trans: dakchak naljor ché dang chamdral gyi

text.en: Presented by us, the yogis and yoginīs, brothers and sisters,
May the darkness of impairments and breakages of samaya, thoughts and obscurations be cleared away in basic space.
text.en-trans: nyamchak tok drib münpa ying su sang

text.en: May the light of wisdom and siddhis—both common and supreme—expand.
May we be guided by the gurus, yidams, and ḍākinīs,
And accomplish effortlessly within this very lifetime
text.en-trans: dorjé lam lé namdrol drebü chok

text.en: The supreme fruition, liberation, through the vajra path.
text.en-trans: kawa mepar tsé dir drubpar shok

text.en: Whenever impermanence and death should befall us,
text.en-trans: namzhik mi tak kyechi jung si tsé

text.en: May the luminous lamp of pristine wisdom show the way,
text.en-trans: yeshe drönmé nangwé shul tsön té

text.en: So that we find relief in Akaniṣṭha, the land of great bliss,
text.en-trans: womin dechen zhing du uk chung né

text.en: And there accomplish, all together, the kāya of co-emergent wisdom.
text.en-trans: chamchik lhenkyé yeshe ku drub shok
